name: PRO100 3D Interior Catalog Element
summary: Learn about .MEB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Interior designers, furniture makers, and cabinet manufacturers use PRO100 to create detailed 3D layouts for kitchens, closets, offices, and other spaces. They import MEB files into PRO100 projects (.STO files) to add catalog items to their virtual room designs, allowing for consistent furniture model reuse and speeding up the design process.

description: A MEB file is a catalog element used by Ecru Software PRO100, a 3D interior and furniture design application developed by Ecru Software. It contains a single design component, such as a cabinet, shelf, or appliance, that users can import into PRO100 and place within a larger interior layout. MEB files store reusable furniture items or decorative elements, allowing designers to drag and drop into a room design.

instructions: You can open MEB files with Ecru Software PRO100 in Windows. To open a MEB file:
In the Catalog panel, right-click within the category where you want to add the new item.
Select Import Elementâ€¦ (or a similar option depending on your version of PRO100) and choose the MEB file you want to import.
